title: "41 interdisciplinary research teams earn Johns Hopkins Discovery Awards"
excerpt: "These are among 41 multidisciplinary endeavors that have been selected to receive support this year from Johns Hopkins University's Discovery Awards program. Each project team is made up of members from at least two JHU entities who aim to solve a complex problem and expand the horizons of knowledge."
